sentences.sentence: I never saw such a glaring example of misrepresentation.
sentences.translation: 我从未见过这样一个明显歪曲事实的例子。

sentences.sentence: I wish to point out your misrepresentation of the facts.
sentences.translation: 我想指出你们对事实的曲解。

sentences.sentence: This can lead to misinterpretation and misrepresentation of the data contained in the enterprise data source.
sentences.translation: 这会导致对企业数据源中包含的数据的误解和误传。
